>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.G7p2YIGFTAU6uGjL]{Stellar Revelation}

 @Icon[type:photon] Photon Revelation

As a standard action while shedding normal or bright light with your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.7VVFPck5IJhTmP7q]{Flare (Su)} revelation, you can infuse the light with the Positive Energy Plane’s life-giving influence, granting creatures in the illuminated area the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.QtZHSuJf0hcryYtR]{Death Ward} spell. This additional effect lasts for 1 round or until you leave photon mode, whichever happens first, though you can maintain this effect as a standard action each round (or as a move action if you’re fully attuned). When you @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.tOpF6qjnlnKc10t7]{Blind} an undead creature with your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.7VVFPck5IJhTmP7q]{Flare (Su)} revelation flash of brilliant light, the target also takes force damage equal to your solarian level.

You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.7VVFPck5IJhTmP7q]{Flare (Su)} revelation to select this revelation.
